attributes.action: Create a 'boot camp' style program for ANY person found to be in possesion of a knife or firearm.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suggested program length is 8 weeks. 
The program can be run by the Army.
With the increase of knife crime murder and robbery on our streets, it seems logical to provide an immediate deterrent to those who think it is OK.
The  cities of the UK are fast catching the lawlessness of 'famous' crime capitals of the world. 
Something must be done.
Other suggestions:
Create a new moral standards committee recognising the power of the media and the need for much stricter restrictions: Movies, PC games, Song Lyrics.
Allow stronger discipline back into schools and homes.
